title: Constructivist Pre-Service Teacher Education Design Process in Technology-Enhanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of educational theories and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Pre-Service Teachers Collaboratively Integrate Technology, Pedagogy, and Content in Design Activities, Emphasizing Asynchronous Interaction and Social Coordination. Activity-Based Learning in VR/Simulation Environments Mimicking Real Classroom Scenarios

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design technology-enhanced learning environments by applying the TPACK (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge) framework.
Collaborative design activities promote social interaction with peers and instructors, enabling knowledge construction within an online community (CoI model).
Simulation/VR tools can be utilized to develop blended knowledge-based (technology + pedagogy + content) instructional materials suitable for real classroom contexts.

resources: TPACK and CoI Model Educational Resources

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
